text_block_list.text:
A few days have passed since the Summer Training Camp has 
started. 
Camp is quiet at night, everyone sleeping soundly.

I got up to grab a drink of water, 
but the deserted lobby was somewhat eerie――
Boo～.
choice_data_list: Aaaah!

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
Fufufu, now that's a good reaction. 
You've got something to fear, don't you, Trainer.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
Don't look at me like that. 
It was just a sudden impulse, I humbly beg for your forgiveness.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
My eyes started to get a bit glazed over. 
I was bored out of my mind, and then you came, Trainer!
choice_data_list: Can't sleep?
Can't sleep?

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
No need to fret. I'm not having trouble or anything. 
But, perhaps this is a good opportunity.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: Trainer, would you like to go for an evening walk with me?

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
Ahh, what a lovely night―― 
I don't know if I've had such a free evening since we arrived 
at Camp.
choice_data_list:
You haven't gone to any of the summer festivals or 
fireworks displays?

You haven't gone to any of the summer festivals or 
fireworks displays?

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
In spite of appearances, dorm heads have much to do. 
I've been comforting Pony-chans who can't sleep because 
their pillows have been changed.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
But just for tonight, I'm going to forget my position and keep 
you all to myself.
choice_data_list: Don't tease the adults too much, okay?
Don't tease the adults too much, okay?

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
Ahaha, but I'm serious. 
I want you to keep your eyes on me, Trainer.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: Say, let's race to the beach.
choice_data_list: H, hey, wait a second――
H, hey, wait a second――

text_block_list.text: As soon as she said it, Fuji Kiseki took off.

She truly is a "Black Meteor." Graceful and powerful, she shows 
no sign of hesitation.

And, she was imbued with impending passion. 
The insatiable passion to run.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: Haa… hah…

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
The sound of the rippling waves is quite nice――this really is 
a beautiful night.
choice_data_list: Fuji Kiseki, what on earth got into――
Fuji Kiseki, what on earth got into――

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
How was it? I wanted to show you the results of my training 
camp. 
I've really enjoyed running the past few days.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: …Did I make your heart pound?
choice_data_list: You scared the hell out of me!

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
I have something I want you to hear. 
Something important.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
I have been thinking about this ever since that junior left the 
Academy due to her injury. 
What was the dream "as an Uma Musume" entrusted to her?

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: I wonder how I could carry on her wishes for her, too.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
But, I realized that day when I went to see the play with you. 
What I should do.
choice_data_list: Tell me.
Tell me.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
The best Entertainer who delights all, "Fuji Kiseki"! 
That's who I want to be.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: But, there was a continuation to this dream.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
I want to entertain everyone and heal everyone's sorrows. 
I want to carry out someone's unfulfilled dream.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: For that purpose, I am second to none!

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
I'm going to keep running, and winning lots of races! 
That's how I'll get lots of wins――

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
Someday, I will obtain the "best proof" of the dream of an 
Uma Musume.
choice_data_list: The best proof, you can't mean…

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: ――I want to win the Triple Crown. That is my dream.
choice_data_list: The Triple Crown…!

text_block_list.text:
The Triple Crown is a title given only to those Uma Musume 
who win three special races: the Satsuki Sho, the Japan 
Derby, and the Kikka Sho.

In the history of the Twinkle Series, very few Uma Musume 
have won the Triple Crown. To win that honor is the dream of 
every Uma Musume…!

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
I swear to you tonight. 
――I wonder if I've reached your heart?
choice_data_list: Maybe you did, now that you've told me this.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
Now that I've put it into words, I will make it happen. 
I hate, more than anything, to disappoint anyone!

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
For that purpose, I need to train more seriously. 
Keep me company, Trainer!

After that, I went along with Fuji Kiseki's training for a while. 
There was a fire in her eyes that I had never seen before.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
Whew… I'd like to say I'm not quite done yet, but the sky is 
about to turn light.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
At any rate, right before my eyes, a great dream was appearing. 
I just wanted to reach out and seize it.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: Right at this moment, I have the irresistible urge to run.
choice_data_list:
Is there anything I can do to help you achieve your 
dreams?

Is there anything I can do to help you achieve your 
dreams?

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: Once again, I have a favor to ask of you, Trainer.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
I want you to continue to guide me from here on out. 
I want you to be by my side as my number one supporter, as 
my partner!
choice_data_list: I've got you.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
In the name of the very best Entertainer, 
I'll entrance you more than anyone else.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: I want you to watch my "Kiseki Miracle" from the front row seat.
And thus, began the days of chasing dreams with Fuji Kiseki.
